song.eTitle: Let All on Earth Their Voices Raise

verses.verse: Let all the earth their voices raise, To sing the great Jehovah's praise, And bless His holy name: His glory let the people know, His wonders to the nations show, His saving grace proclaim.
Come, the great day, the glorious hour, When earth shall feel His saving power, All nations fear His name; Then shall the race of men confess The beauty of His holiness, His saving grace proclaim.
